root.description: Updates the Ability Input Binding Component registered bindings or create a new one for the passed in Ability Handle.

param.name: Target
param.type: GSCAbility Input Binding Component Object Reference

param.name: Input Action
param.description: The Enhanced InputAction to bind to

param.name: Trigger Event
param.description: The trigger type to use for the ability pressed handle. The most common trigger types are likely to be Started for actions that happen once, immediately upon pressing a button.

param.name: Ability Handle
param.description: The Gameplay Ability Spec handle to setup binding for (handle returned when granting abilities manually with GSCAbilitySystemComponent)
